templates: Every morning, I brush my teeth with ___ and scream ___ at the mirror.
My childhood dream was to become a ___ who rides a ___ to work.
Nothing says ‘good morning’ like ___ in my cereal and ___ on the radio.
When I grow up, I want to be ___, just like my ___.
I was banned from the family group chat for sending a picture of ___ next to ___.
The funeral was going fine until someone brought up ___.
My therapist says I need to stop talking about ___ while doing ___.
I thought my boss liked me, but then I got assigned to the ___ project with ___.
Step 1: Summon a demon. Step 2: Offer it ___. Step 3: ___.
The worst part of the surgery wasn’t the pain. It was ___ whispering about ___.
My pet ___ talks to ghosts and screams about ___ at 3 AM.
My last words before being abducted by cultists were: ‘___ isn't illegal if you're ___.’
Oh great, another Monday filled with ___ and emotional ___ from my inbox.
I just love it when my boss emails me at 3 AM about ___.
Modern dating is just ___ pretending not to care about ___.
Self-care means ___ while silently judging everyone who doesn't ___ like me.
Capitalism peaked when we started selling ___ with a monthly subscription to ___.
I fixed climate change by investing in ___ and yelling at ___.
To win the election, the candidate promised free ___ and mandatory ___.
Modern society runs on three things: ___, denial, and ___.
